12 #include <stdio.h>

16 #include <netinet/ip6.h>

18 #include <libnetfilter_queue/libnetfilter_queue.h>

35 EXPORT_SYMBOL
36 struct ip6_hdr *nfq_ip6_get_hdr(struct pkt_buff *pktb)
37 {
38  struct ip6_hdr *ip6h;
39  unsigned int pktlen = pktb_tail(pktb) - pktb->network_header;
40 
41  /* Not enough room for IPv6 header. */
42  if (pktlen < sizeof(struct ip6_hdr))
43  return NULL;
44 
45  ip6h = (struct ip6_hdr *)pktb->network_header;
46 
47  /* Not IPv6 packet. */
48  if ((*(uint8_t *)ip6h & 0xf0) != 0x60)
49  return NULL;
50 
51  return ip6h;
52 }
53 
63 EXPORT_SYMBOL
64 int nfq_ip6_set_transport_header(struct pkt_buff *pktb, struct ip6_hdr *ip6h,
65  uint8_t target)
66 {
67  uint8_t nexthdr = ip6h->ip6_nxt;
68  uint8_t *cur = (uint8_t *)ip6h + sizeof(struct ip6_hdr);
69 
70  while (nexthdr == IPPROTO_HOPOPTS ||
71  nexthdr == IPPROTO_ROUTING ||
72  nexthdr == IPPROTO_FRAGMENT ||
73  nexthdr == IPPROTO_AH ||
74  nexthdr == IPPROTO_NONE ||
75  nexthdr == IPPROTO_DSTOPTS) {
76  struct ip6_ext *ip6_ext;
77  uint32_t hdrlen;
78 
79  /* Extension header was requested, we're done. */
80  if (nexthdr == target)
81  break;
82 
83  /* No more extensions, we're done. */
84  if (nexthdr == IPPROTO_NONE) {
85  cur = NULL;
86  break;
87  }
88  /* No room for extension, bad packet. */
89  if (pktb_tail(pktb) - cur < sizeof(struct ip6_ext)) {
90  cur = NULL;
91  break;
92  }
93  ip6_ext = (struct ip6_ext *)cur;
94 
95  if (nexthdr == IPPROTO_FRAGMENT) {
96  uint16_t *frag_off;
97 
98  /* No room for full fragment header, bad packet. */
99  if (pktb_tail(pktb) - cur < sizeof(struct ip6_frag)) {
100  cur = NULL;
101  break;
102  }
103 
104  frag_off = (uint16_t *)cur +
105  offsetof(struct ip6_frag, ip6f_offlg);
106 
107  /* Fragment offset is only 13 bits long. */
108  if (htons(*frag_off & ~0x7)) {
109  /* Not the first fragment, it does not contain
110  * any headers.
111  */
112  cur = NULL;
113  break;
114  }
115  hdrlen = sizeof(struct ip6_frag);
116  } else if (nexthdr == IPPROTO_AH)
117  hdrlen = (ip6_ext->ip6e_len + 2) << 2;
118  else
119  hdrlen = (ip6_ext->ip6e_len + 1) << 3;
120 
121  nexthdr = ip6_ext->ip6e_nxt;
122  cur += hdrlen;
123  }
124  if (nexthdr != target)
125  cur = NULL;
126  pktb->transport_header = cur;
127  return cur ? 1 : 0;
128 }
129 
141 EXPORT_SYMBOL
142 int nfq_ip6_mangle(struct pkt_buff *pktb, unsigned int dataoff,
143  unsigned int match_offset, unsigned int match_len,
144  const char *rep_buffer, unsigned int rep_len)
145 {
146  struct ip6_hdr *ip6h = (struct ip6_hdr *)pktb->network_header;
147 
148  if (!pktb_mangle(pktb, dataoff, match_offset, match_len, rep_buffer,
149  rep_len))
150  return 0;
151 
152  /* Fix IPv6 hdr length information */
153  ip6h->ip6_plen =
154  htons(pktb_tail(pktb) - pktb->network_header - sizeof *ip6h);
155 
156  return 1;
157 }
158 
168 EXPORT_SYMBOL
169 int nfq_ip6_snprintf(char *buf, size_t size, const struct ip6_hdr *ip6h)
170 {
171  int ret;
172  char src[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
173  char dst[INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
174 
175  inet_ntop(AF_INET6, &ip6h->ip6_src, src, INET6_ADDRSTRLEN);
176  inet_ntop(AF_INET6, &ip6h->ip6_dst, dst, INET6_ADDRSTRLEN);
177 
178  ret = snprintf(buf, size, "SRC=%s DST=%s LEN=%zu TC=0x%X "
179  "HOPLIMIT=%u FLOWLBL=%u ",
180  src, dst,
181  ntohs(ip6h->ip6_plen) + sizeof(struct ip6_hdr),
182  (ip6h->ip6_flow & 0x0ff00000) >> 20,
183  ip6h->ip6_hlim,
184  (ip6h->ip6_flow & 0x000fffff));
185 
186  return ret;
187 }
